name: Goodbye Hazel (Spectator Round 3)
description:
Goodbye Hazel is a visual novel made in twine. This game was made for DreamCatcherOCT. The game is set in a dreamworld where many beings have been trapped. She is being pursued by a being whose powers approximate a god. This is the 4th game in the series. 

  • Each Passage Has a Unique Image
  • Two Routes
  • Trans Woman Protagonist who is also a Fairy
  • Glitter
